definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile

sentences.english: Learn how Montessori teaches mathematics in this free video clip.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在這個自由蒙臺梭利教數學的視頻剪輯。

sentences.english: At the activity class, I helped our teacher to make the music.
sentences.chinese: 在活動課上，我幫助我的英語老師剪輯音樂。

sentences.english: An edited version will also be played in movie theaters.
sentences.chinese: 剪輯版的短片也將在電影院上映。

sentences.english: See examples of theme gift baskets with expert gift giving advice in this free video clip.
sentences.chinese: 請看專家在此免費送禮視頻剪輯諮詢主題禮籃的例子。

sentences.english: The motion accelerates and decelerates at the beginning and end of each clip.
sentences.chinese: 移動在開始和結尾的每個剪輯處加速和減速。

sentences.english: The clipping region top-left point X-coordinate.
sentences.chinese: 剪輯區域左上方點的X座標。

sentences.english: How do I add MovieClips to the stage while using AIR?
sentences.chinese: 我如何在舞臺上添加動畫剪輯而使用的空氣？

sentences.english: The film is to be cleaned up and re- edited.
sentences.chinese: 這部影片應剔除糟粕，重新進行剪輯。
強制這個剪輯到單聲道？

sentences.english: Through code AS, align the MovieClips…
sentences.chinese: 通過代碼，對齊影片剪輯。

sentences.english: Clips from the movie will be presented on video.
sentences.chinese: 這部影片的剪輯將在電視上播映。

sentences.english: Learn tips and techniques of the composition of your video in this free video clip on videography.
sentences.chinese: 學習技巧和作曲技法的視頻錄像在此免費視頻剪輯。

sentences.english: Our clip tips help you use our free clip art most effectively.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀我們的剪輯提示有助於更有效地使用剪貼畫。

sentences.english: Learn the history of ninjutsu in this free video clip from a master ninja.
sentences.chinese: 學習忍術在此免費視頻剪輯的歷史，從主忍者。

sentences.english: Videostudio is a set of specially designed for personal and family film editing software.
sentences.chinese: 會聲會影是一套專爲個人及家庭設計的影片剪輯軟件。

sentences.english: Under the initiative, 10-second clips of around two dozen new movies would be shown as the show's credits roll.
sentences.chinese: 據說會有24部左右的新片的十秒剪輯滾動播出。

definition: script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
cast and crew/performers and production team
dialogue (in a movie or a play)
camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
